verbs.description: ( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - [ARG0: The federal government] [V: cut] [ARG1: 3,000 jobs] [ARGM-TMP: in May] and federal employment has now dropped by 24,000 since President Donald Trump took office , according to data released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics .

( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - The federal government cut 3,000 jobs in May and federal employment [V: has] now dropped by 24,000 since President Donald Trump took office , according to data released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics .

( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - The federal government cut 3,000 jobs in May and [ARG1: federal employment] has [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: dropped] [ARG2: by 24,000] [ARGM-TMP: since President Donald Trump took office] , according to data released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics .

( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - The federal government cut 3,000 jobs in May and federal employment has now dropped by 24,000 since [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: office] , according to data released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics .

( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - The federal government cut 3,000 jobs in May and federal employment has now dropped by 24,000 since President Donald Trump took office , [V: according] to data released today by the Bureau of Labor Statistics .

( Screen Capture ) ( CNSNews.com ) - The federal government cut 3,000 jobs in May and federal employment has now dropped by 24,000 since President Donald Trump took office , according to [ARG1: data] [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: today] [ARG0: by the Bureau of Labor Statistics] .
